scripts.build_all: cd $INIT_CWD && for d in `ls -d */`; do cd `pwd`/$d; echo ============ && echo `pwd` && tsc --build `pwd` && yarn gas-tools copy_deps `pwd`; cd ..;done
scripts.clean_all: cd $INIT_CWD && for d in `ls -d */`; do cd `pwd`/$d; echo ============ && echo `pwd` && yarn gas-tools clean_all `pwd`; cd ..;done
scripts.test_all:vitest: cd $INIT_CWD && for d in `ls -d */`; do cd `pwd`/$d; echo ============ && echo `pwd` && vitest --passWithNoTests --run --dir .; cd ..;done
scripts.test_all:gas: cd $INIT_CWD && for d in `ls -d */`; do cd `pwd`/$d; echo ============ && echo `pwd` && clasp run $d_test_all; cd ..;done
